story.name: Minecraft
story.description: The heart and story of the game

story.name: Stone Age
story.description: Mine stone with your new pickaxe

story.name: Suit Up
story.description: Protect yourself with a piece of iron armor

story.name: Not Today, Thank You
story.description: Block a projectile using your shield.

story.name: We Need to Go Deeper
story.description: Build, light and enter a Nether Portal

story.name: Enchanter
story.description: Enchant an item at an Enchantment Table

story.name: Zombie Doctor
story.description: Weaken and then cure a Zombie Villager

nether.name: Nether
nether.description: Bring summer clothes

nether.name: Return to Sender
nether.description: Destroy a Ghast with a fireball

nether.name: Those Were the Days
nether.description: Enter a Bastion Remnant

nether.name: Hidden in the Depths
nether.description: Obtain Ancient Debris

nether.name: Subspace Bubble
nether.description: Use the Nether to travel 7 km in the Overworld

nether.name: A Terrible Fortress
nether.description: Break your way into a Nether Fortress

nether.name: Who is Cutting Onions?
nether.description: Obtain Crying Obsidian

nether.name: Oh Shiny
nether.description: Distract Piglins with gold

nether.name: This Boat Has Legs
nether.description: Ride a Strider with a Warped Fungus on a Stick

nether.name: Uneasy Alliance
nether.description: Rescue a Ghast from the Nether, bring it safely home to the Overworld... and then kill it

nether.name: War Pigs
nether.description: Loot a chest in a Bastion Remnant

nether.name: Country Lode, Take Me Home
nether.description: Use a compass on a Lodestone

nether.name: Cover Me in Debris
nether.description: Get a full suit of Netherite armor

nether.name: Spooky Scary Skeleton
nether.description: Obtain a Wither Skeleton's skull

nether.name: Into Fire
nether.description: Relieve a Blaze of its rod

nether.name: Not Quite "Nine" Lives
nether.description: Charge a Respawn Anchor to the maximum

nether.name: Feels like home
nether.description: Take a Strider for a loooong ride on a lava lake in the Overworld

nether.name: Hot Tourist Destinations
nether.description: Explore all Nether biomes

nether.name: Withering Heights
nether.description: Summon the Wither

nether.name: Local Brewery
nether.description: Brew a potion

nether.name: Bring Home the Beacon
nether.description: Construct and place a beacon

nether.name: A Furious Cocktail
nether.description: Have every potion effect applied at the same time

nether.name: Beaconator
nether.description: Bring a beacon to full power

nether.name: How Did We Get Here?
nether.description: Have every effect applied at the same time

end.name: You Need a Mint
end.description: Collect dragon's breath in a glass bottle

end.name: The City at the End of the Game
end.description: Go on in, what could happen?

end.name: Great View From Up Here
end.description: Levitate up 50 blocks from the attacks of a Shulker

adventure.name: Adventure
adventure.description: Adventure, exploration, and combat

adventure.name: Voluntary Exile
adventure.description:
Kill a raid captain.
Maybe consider staying away from villages for the time being...

adventure.name: Is It a Bird?
adventure.description: Look at a parrot through a spyglass

adventure.name: Monster Hunter
adventure.description: Kill any hostile monster

adventure.name: The Power of Books
adventure.description: Read the power signal of a Chiseled Bookshelf using a Comparator

adventure.name: What a Deal!
adventure.description: Successfully trade with a Villager

adventure.name: Crafting a New Look
adventure.description: Craft a trimmed armor at a Smithing Table

adventure.name: Sticky Situation
adventure.description: Jump into a Honey Block to break your fall

adventure.name: Ol' Betsy
adventure.description: Shoot a crossbow

adventure.name: Surge Protector
adventure.description: Protect a villager from an undesired shock without starting a fire

adventure.name: Caves & Cliffs
adventure.description: Free fall from the top of the world (build limit) to the bottom of the world and survive

adventure.name: Respecting the Remnants
adventure.description: Brush a Suspicious block to obtain a Pottery Sherd

adventure.name: Sneak 100
adventure.description: Sneak near a Sculk Sensor, Sculk Shrieker or Warden to prevent it from hearing you

adventure.name: Sweet Dreams
adventure.description: Sleep in a bed to change your respawn point

adventure.name: Hero of the Village
adventure.description: Successfully defend a village from a raid

adventure.name: Is It a Balloon?
adventure.description: Look at a ghast through a spyglass

adventure.name: A Throwaway Joke
adventure.description:
Throw a trident at something.
Note: Throwing away your only weapon is not a good idea.

adventure.name: It Spreads
adventure.description: Kill a mob near a Sculk Catalyst

adventure.name: Take Aim
adventure.description: Shoot something with an arrow

adventure.name: Monsters Hunted
adventure.description: Kill one of every hostile monster

adventure.name: Postmortal
adventure.description: Use a Totem of Undying to cheat death

adventure.name: Hired Help
adventure.description: Summon an Iron Golem to help defend a village

adventure.name: Star Trader
adventure.description: Trade with a Villager at the build height limit

adventure.name: Smithing with Style
adventure.description: Apply these smithing templates at least once: Spire, Snout, Rib, Ward, Silence, Vex, Tide, Wayfinder

adventure.name: Who's the Pillager Now?
adventure.description: Give a Pillager a taste of their own medicine

adventure.name: Two Birds, One Arrow
adventure.description: Kill two Phantoms with a piercing arrow

adventure.name: Arbalistic
adventure.description: Kill five unique mobs with one crossbow shot

adventure.name: Careful Restoration
adventure.description: Make a Decorated Pot out of 4 Pottery Sherds

adventure.name: Adventuring Time
adventure.description: Discover every biome

adventure.name: Sound of Music
adventure.description: Make the Meadows come alive with the sound of music from a Jukebox

adventure.name: Light as a Rabbit
adventure.description: Walk on powder snow...without sinking in it

adventure.name: Is It a Plane?
adventure.description: Look at the Ender Dragon through a spyglass

adventure.name: Very Very Frightening
adventure.description: Strike a Villager with lightning

adventure.name: Sniper Duel
adventure.description: Kill a Skeleton from at least 50 meters away

adventure.name: Bullseye
adventure.description: Hit the bullseye of a Target block from at least 30 meters away

adventure.name: Isn't It Scute?
adventure.description: Get Armadillo Scutes from an Armadillo using a Brush

husbandry.name: Husbandry
husbandry.description: The world is full of friends and food

husbandry.name: Bee Our Guest
husbandry.description: Use a Campfire to collect Honey from a Beehive using a Bottle without aggravating the bees

husbandry.name: The Parrots and the Bats
husbandry.description: Breed two animals together

husbandry.name: You've Got a Friend in Me
husbandry.description: Have an Allay deliver items to you

husbandry.name: Whatever Floats Your Goat!
husbandry.description: Get in a Boat and float with a Goat

husbandry.name: Best Friends Forever
husbandry.description: Tame an animal

husbandry.name: Glow and Behold!
husbandry.description: Make the text of a sign glow

husbandry.name: Fishy Business
husbandry.description: Catch a fish

husbandry.name: Total Beelocation
husbandry.description: Move a Bee Nest, with 3 bees inside, using Silk Touch

husbandry.name: Bukkit Bukkit
husbandry.description: Catch a Tadpole in a Bucket

husbandry.name: Smells Interesting
husbandry.description: Obtain a Sniffer Egg

husbandry.name: A Seedy Place
husbandry.description: Plant a seed and watch it grow

husbandry.name: Wax On
husbandry.description: Apply Honeycomb to a Copper block!

husbandry.name: Two by Two
husbandry.description: Breed all the animals!

husbandry.name: Birthday Song
husbandry.description: Have an Allay drop a Cake at a Note Block!

husbandry.name: A Complete Catalogue
husbandry.description: Tame all cat variants!

husbandry.name: Tactical Fishing
husbandry.description: Catch a fish... without a fishing rod!

husbandry.name: When the Squad Hops into Town
husbandry.description: Get each Frog variant on a Lead

husbandry.name: Little Sniffs
husbandry.description: Feed a Snifflet

husbandry.name: A Balanced Diet
husbandry.description: Eat everything that is edible, even if it's not good for you

husbandry.name: Serious Dedication
husbandry.description: Use a Netherite Ingot to upgrade a hoe, and then reevaluate your life choices

husbandry.name: Wax Off
husbandry.description: Scrape Wax off of a Copper block!

husbandry.name: The Cutest Predator
husbandry.description: Catch an axolotl in a bucket

husbandry.name: With Our Powers Combined!
husbandry.description: Have all Froglights in your inventory

husbandry.name: Planting the Past
husbandry.description: Plant any Sniffer seed

husbandry.name: The Healing Power of Friendship!
husbandry.description: Team up with an axolotl and win a fight

husbandry.name: Good as New
husbandry.description: Repair a damaged Wolf Armor using Armadillo Scutes

husbandry.name: The Whole Pack
husbandry.description: Tame one of each Wolf variant

husbandry.name: Shear Brilliance
husbandry.description: Remove Wolf Armor from a Wolf using Shears
